name: Rad Rhino
description:
This is a .bin file that runs on a Genesis / Mega Drive. You need an emulator or actual hardware to play.

You are the last Rhino and Birb in the world, forced out of what little wild lands remain. Now there's nothing left to do but kill every human.

Two player shooting action! It's called Rad Rhino but player 1 is the Birb. Shoot, run, and flap!

Made in 60 some-odd hours for Ludum Dare 42 using Stephane Dallongeville's excellent Genesis SDK: https://github.com/Stephane-D/SGDK
